deprecated_yaml.title: The Meteo Swiss YAML configuration is being removed
deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring Meteo Swiss using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically.

Remove the Swiss Meteo configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.

station_no_data.title: Meteo Swiss weather station appears to be gone
station_no_data.description:
The real-time weather station Meteo Swiss is using ({station}) is no longer offering data.

Currently, the only repair possible involves removing and re-adding the Meteo Swiss integration, selecting a new real-time weather station.

Until this repair is made, all real-time weather sensors and reports coming from this station will show as unavailable.

abort.unknown: Ukjent feil: prøv på nytt senere

error.lat: The supplied latitude does not fall between -90 y 90 degrees
error.lon: The supplied latitude does not fall between -180 y 180 degrees
error.invalid_station_name: Stasjonsnavnet er ugyldig. Vennligst sjekk https://rudd-o.com/meteostations for stasjonsliste
error.invalid_postcode: Postnummer er ugyldig. Denne integrasjonen fungerer bare med Sveits postnummer
error.invalid_station_id: Stasjonsnavnet ble ikke funnet. Vennligst sjekk https://rudd-o.com/meteostations for stasjonsliste
error.update_interval_too_low: The update interval is too low.  Must be minimum 1 minute.

user.description: Confirm your geographical position.  This will be used to guess the closest real-time weather station and approximate your postal code for forecasts.
user.title: Location

user_two.description: The postal code is used to look up the 5-day forecast.
user_two.title: Postnummer

user_three.description: The real-time weather station is used to look up the current weather.  https://rudd-o.com/meteostations lists the stations.
user_three.title: Weather station
